text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM><DEALER>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben:</DEALER><BIBLLIST><BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>deßelben</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-Hübner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymahl zwey und fünffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Ubungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></BIBLLIST></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":19,"explanation":"The original XML string had several issues. Firstly, there were numerous character encoding errors, resulting in incorrect symbols (e.g., '√º' instead of 'ü', '√§' instead of 'ä', '√ü' instead of 'ß', and '√≤' instead of 'vo'). These have all been corrected. Secondly, the structure was flawed. An introductory sentence was mixed with the data; it has been separated into a <DEALER> tag. The list of books was a flat sequence with one improperly nested <BIBL> tag. A <BIBLLIST> wrapper was added, the nesting was corrected, and all <BIBL> elements were made siblings. Finally, extraneous text separators from the original prose ('Item', ';', '.') were removed as the new XML structure makes them redundant."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM><DEALER>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben:</DEALER><BIBLLIST><BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>deßelben</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-Hübner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymahl zwey und fünffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL><BIBL><TITLE>Ubungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></BIBLLIST></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: The original XML string had several issues. Firstly, there were numerous character encoding errors, resulting in incorrect symbols (e.g., '√º' instead of 'ü', '√§' instead of 'ä', '√ü' instead of 'ß', and '√≤' instead of 'vo'). These have all been corrected. Secondly, the structure was flawed. An introductory sentence was mixed with the data; it has been separated into a <DEALER> tag. The list of books was a flat sequence with one improperly nested <BIBL> tag. A <BIBLLIST> wrapper was added, the nesting was corrected, and all <BIBL> elements were made siblings. Finally, extraneous text separators from the original prose ('Item', ';', '.') were removed as the new XML structure makes them redundant.
